name: Witcherella
description:
A quest like no other. 
A daring escape. 
A test of mental fortitude.

Have you the courage, fair player?

I ask you, are you daring enough to take on...THE APPRENTICE WITCH?!

That's right, in Witcherella, you and you companions are the heroes of your own story. Your task? Escape the clumsy clutches of one apprentice witch and her familiar, Winston the Duck. 

Use your wits and observational skills to make careful decisions, and you might just survive...
